hero.description: bugket helps studios deliver flawless games to players worldwide. Our QA experts test on all platforms, all regions, all genres.

contact.name: Name
contact.success: Thank you for contacting bugket! We'll get back to you soon.

team.name: Alex Carter
team.description: 10+ years in game QA, expert in automation and process optimization. Loves RPGs and coffee.

team.name: Jamie Lee
team.description: Specialist in multiplayer and cross-platform testing. Board game enthusiast and puzzle solver.

team.name: Chris Novak
team.description: Mobile and VR QA wizard. Speedrunner and retro gaming fan.

funFacts: We have a Mario Kart tournament every Friday!
We once found 1,000+ bugs in a single week.
Our office has more consoles than desks.

services.hero: All your QA needs, one team
services.description: From bug hunting to platform certification, bugket covers every aspect of game QA with passion and precision.

list.title: Functional Testing
list.desc: We find bugs before your players do. Manual and automated tests for every feature, every build.

list.title: Compatibility
list.desc: Tested on all platforms, devices, and controllers. No more nasty surprises on launch day.

list.title: Certification QA
list.desc: We help you pass PlayStation, Xbox, Nintendo, and mobile store requirements.

list.title: Performance QA
list.desc: FPS, memory, load times: we profile and optimize for smooth gameplay everywhere.

list.title: Mobile QA
list.desc: iOS, Android, tablets: we cover all mobile devices and OS versions.

list.title: Security & Anti-Cheat
list.desc: Protect your game and your players with advanced security and anti-cheat testing.

why: Expert QA team with gaming passion
services.cta: Ready to level up your QA?

expertise.description: Our expertise covers every aspect of QA, from automation to multiplayer, VR, and analytics. We help you ship better games, faster.

list.title: Automation & Tools
list.desc: Custom scripts and tools to speed up QA and catch more bugs.

list.title: Multiplayer Testing
list.desc: Stress tests, matchmaking, and crossplay for seamless online experiences.

list.title: Analytics & Reporting
list.desc: Detailed bug tracking, analytics, and actionable reports for your team.

list.title: VR/AR QA
list.desc: Expertise in immersive and next-gen platforms.

list.title: Network & Latency
list.desc: Simulate real-world network conditions for robust online play.

list.title: AI & Bot Testing
list.desc: Automated bots for repetitive and regression testing.

homeCards.title: Global QA for Every Game
homeCards.text: bugket helps studios deliver flawless games to players worldwide. Our QA experts test on all platforms, all regions, all genres.

homeCards.title: Automation & Custom Tools
homeCards.text: We build and use custom tools to speed up testing, catch more bugs, and make your releases smoother.

homeCards.title: Next-gen QA Expertise
homeCards.text: From multiplayer to VR, our team has hands-on experience with the latest gaming tech and standards.
